messages.subject: World Trade Center
messages.msgSnippet: This is so very upsetting. I am bundle of nerves while I await calls from some friends. I have heard from my mom (in Washington DC), her husband is a big wig
messages.messageBody:
This is so very upsetting. I am bundle of nerves while I await calls from
some friends. I have heard from my mom (in Washington DC), her husband is a
big wig in the military and often consults with the Presidents (Reagan thru
current)... My husband is military, my brother too. We have lots of friends
in military and I have a girlfriend in New York City. This certaintly puts
all our petty disagreements in proper perspective. I ask that we all pray in
are own way. This is incredibly serious.

Anyone with family in any of the areas or flights can call the Red Cross.
They are amazing and will help. If they can't they will give you the numbers
of people who can. Michele I hope that helps....I will pray for you and your
daughters. Keep us updated.

~Sheri
